name: MATH GENIUS
description:
This Game is made up of four different levels where you will have to face it in increasing
difficulties.
All you have to do is to do is to burst bubble which have the correct math equation in it.
Only math you have have to know is addition,subtraction,multiplication and division,then
 choose your level accordingly.
Keep your reflexes sharp as the difficulties increase.
Challenge all your friends and family and find out who really is a math genius
